thread.title: BRIEF-Noranda holds 'positive outlook' for aluminum prices beyond the near-term -CEO
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Noranda holds 'positive outlook' for aluminum prices beyond the near-term -CEO | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Noranda holds 'positive outlook' for aluminum prices beyond the near-term -CEO
text:
July 22 Noranda Aluminum Holding Corp :
* Noranda CEO Kip Smith says the company continues to hold a "positive outlook" for aluminum prices beyond near-term in second-quarter earnings call
* Smith notes that both LME aluminum prices and Midwest premiums have stabilized after dropping sharply in May Source: bit.ly/1LDaJsa Further company coverage: (Reporting by Luc Cohen)
